source: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?section=templates&id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.33 target: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html
IHE-DIS: If the product-element contains package information, the unit attribute is not be present
IHE-DIS: If the product-element does not contain package information, the unit attribut is present and the value SHALL be out of the UCUM code system
quantity value (number of packages)
IHE: Case 1: If the capacityQuantity is given in countable units, the unit attribute SHALL NOT be present
IHE: Case 2: If the capacityQuantity is given in non-countable units, the unit attribute SHALL be present and the value SHALL be out of the UCUM code system.
Package size
dosage for normal dosing, as no sequences are present there

source: Substitution act Contains 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.9.1.3.9.2 IHE Substitution Act Content Module target: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html
act.code as code -> substitution.type as type then CECodeableConcept(code, type) "type";

source: https://art-decor.org/art-decor/decor-templates--cdachemed-?section=templates&id=2.16.756.5.30.1.1.10.4.42 target: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/branches/master/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationdispense.html

dosage for split dosing, as sequences are present there
dose quantity for dosage (application schema)
doseQuantity.unit as unit -> quantity.unit = translate(unit, 'http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-emed/ValueSet/UnitsOfPresentation', 'display') "unit";

source: Substitution permission Contains 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.9.1.3.9.1 IHE Substitution Permission Content Module (DYNAMIC) target: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationrequest.html
act.code as code -> substitution.allowed = create('CodeableConcept') as allowedCC then CECodeableConcept(code, allowedCC) "allowedCC";

source: Substitution permission Contains 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.9.1.3.9.1 IHE Substitution Permission Content Module (DYNAMIC) target: http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7ch/ch-emed/StructureDefinition-ch-emed-medicationstatement.html
act.code as code -> ext.value = create('CodeableConcept') as valueCC then CECodeableConcept(code, valueCC) "valueCC";
